These files are part of https://bitbucket.org/qbrobotics/qbdevice-ros.git
and located in qb_device_driver/api/src/*

Below we give the list of the main changes introduced for ViSP

- 2023.09.12 (see PR #1230)
  - Fix compatibility with Debian GNU/Hurd adding __gnu_hurd__ macro to specialize the code
